document_data.name: Sambar
document_data.mainbody:
'''Father Sambar''' was a priest of [[Shar]] posing a priest of [[Mystra]] at the false [[Temple of Mystra (Wheloon)|Temple of Mystra]] in [[Wheloon]], [[Cormyr]], in the [[1374 DR|Year of Lightning Storms, 1374 DR]].

Father Sambar was the first to pass through the [[Shadow Gate]], a ''[[portal]]'' to the [[Plane of Shadow]] intended to provide a shortcut for the Sharrans' operations. However, the [[generic temple guard|temple guard]] accompanying him survived, becoming a [[dark]] creature, the first of the [[generic shadow guard|shadow guards]].

Sambar's bones were left heaped around the altar, the first of many, and his quarters remained empty.
